testCase.requirementText: An xml:id identifier for the file section used for internal package references. It must be unique within the package. The requirement links to http://earkcsip.dilcis.eu/#the-use-of-identifiers and simple xml-validation will catch if IDs are not unique. Therefore it is considered out of scope within this test corpus.
testCase.description: CSIP59 is another requirment that should be enforced by the METS schema validation
